modShortDescription: Returns the old loot distribution system, something like A18. For those who are not quite satisfied with the new "stone age".
modDescription:
Returns the old loot distribution system, something like A18\. For those who are not quite satisfied with the new “stone age”.

* **Simple Mode** – just have one prob for llevel 1-999999999, for every TIER.
* **Hard Mode** – have custom prob for every TIER on different player levels.

## Changelog

**v1.1.1:** Change typo in loot.xml which is throwing a parsing error. (Hard Mode)

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Okamich/FallOFBabylon-A19/tree/main/Fob_Loot)** Simple Mode  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Okamich/FallOFBabylon-A19/tree/main/FoB_HardLoot)** Hard Mode

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22025-okami-modlets-fall-of-babylon/).

**Credits:** [Okami](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/okami/)
